technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Breast tissue shows hyperechoic lesion measuring 29.23 mm.
Common bile duct measures 4.64 mm, within normal limits.
Major vessels show isoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Prostate is mildly heterogeneous; volume approximately 17.06 cc.
Placenta is unremarkable and normally located.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
